Directions: Use 1-2x daily. After cleansing, apply a small amount to the under-eye area using the ring finger (to prevent dragging) to pat and smooth into the skin.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
